article_title: Programming Note: Special Edition Of News 9 At Noon Airs 12:30pm - News9.com - Oklahoma City, OK - News, Weather, Video and Sports
article_text:
A special edition of News 9 at Noon will air Monday and Tuesday from 12:30-1:00. The special edition will provide viewers with complete, up-to-the-minute news from Campaign 2016.

Viewers can see regular programming on KSBI 52. Cox Cable subscribers can us channels 7 or 707. Direct subscribers can find "The Bold and the Beautiful" on channel 52. U-Verse subscribers use channel 1052.

article_summary:
A special edition of News 9 at Noon will air Monday and Tuesday from 12:30-1:00.
The special edition will provide viewers with complete, up-to-the-minute news from Campaign 2016.
U-Verse subscribers use channel 1052.
Direct subscribers can find "The Bold and the Beautiful" on channel 52.
Viewers can see regular programming on KSBI 52.
